name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense
display_help: Your mastery over the shield protects you from all forms of attacks in the form of defense as well as some moderate damage resistance to most types of damage. Your training with the shield enables you to protect your nearby allies boosting their defenses.

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Hide
powers.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. No Endurance cost. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Active_Defense
powers.display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 11.25% strength to melee for 0.75s on self
11.25% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
11.25% strength to melee, psionic for 0.75s on self

10.00% strength to melee, psionic for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Deflection
powers.display_help: Your incredible agility allows you to position your shield to protect yourself from incoming ranged damage. While Battle Agility is active you will benefit from increased Ranged and AoE defense as well as some moderate protection from Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 11.25% strength to ranged, AoE for 0.75s on self
11.25% strength to ranged, AoE for 0.75s on self
10.00% strength to ranged, AoE for 0.75s on self
13.84% resistance to defense debuff for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.True_Grit
powers.display_help: Your intense training has left you tougher than even the hardiest of heroes. You gain additional hit points and resistance to fire, cold, energy, negative energy and toxic damage sources. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.
powers.display_short_help: Auto: Self +Res (Cold, Energy, Fire, Negative Energy, Toxic), +MaxHealth

display_info: 11.25% resistance to fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Battle_Agility
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, it grants protection from Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusion, Repel, Knockback, Hold and Defense Debuff effects for a short duration. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Self Res (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback, Defense Debuff)

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Against_all_Odds
powers.display_help: The harder pressed you are in combat the greater your offensive abilities become. Each enemy that stands toe-to-toe with you in combat will grant you a damage bonus. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest damage bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Each foe in melee range also suffers from reduced damage as your shield deflects a portion of their damage. Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 8 ft. radius (10 targets max)

display_info: 10.00% strength to smashing damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1.25s on self
10.00% strength to lethal damage for 1.25s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Grant_Cover
powers.display_help: You are able to use your shield to defend nearby allies. Any teammates who remain nearby gain a bonus to their defense. As a stalker, you can also provide stealth to your teammates if you too are hidden. (NOTE: The defense bonus from this power is only applied to nearby team mates, but not yourself.) Additionally, while this power is active, the user and his team mates will gain some resistance to defense and recharge rate debuffs. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team (but not self) +DEF(All but Psionic), Team +RES(Defense Debuff, Recharge Debuff)

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 15 ft. radius (255 targets max)
display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.Shield_Charge
powers.display_help: You can throw all of your might behind your shield and charge through ranks of foes in the blink of an eye. Using this power allows you to teleport to a selected area to deal significant smashing damage to all foes near the location you teleport to, most foes that are struck by your Shield Charge will be knocked down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Superior DMG(Smashing), Foe Knockdown; Self Teleport

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Shield_Defense.One_with_the_Shield
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, you gain strong resistance against most types of damage and also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Knockback, Repel and Sleep effects. One with the Shield costs little Endurance to activate and increases your recovery and maximum hit points for its duration, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and substantially drained of Endurance. Note that One with the Shield is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Repel, Knockback, All DMG but Psi), +Recovery, +Max HP
